title: White Sands National Monument: Photo Gallery
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Photos & Multimedia     Photo Gallery               Photo Gallery              Remote Camera Many of our animals are nocturnal but we've managed to catch some glimpses of a few through remote cameras.         Amphibians & Fish There are many animals within the park. Reptiles seem to be expected in a desert environment but did you know that there are several amphibians that live here?         Dune Scenics One question we often get is where are the best locations for photos in the park. The answer? Anywhere!         Birds Are you an avid birdwatcher? Then you'll love looking at these fantastic examples of our avian residents.         Mammals Several species of mammals use the dunefield for various things. Some call it home, other call it a cafeteria.         Reptiles There's more than just snakes out there! Many species of lizards, turtles, and tortoises live here in and around the dunefield.
